mean_cn: n. 委员，专员，理事；行政长官
mean_en: a member of a commission :one of a group of people who have been given the official job of finding information about something or controlling something
sentence: The horse is speaking as the commissioner of the vegetarian committee.
sentence_trans: 这匹马作为素食动物特别委员会的委员之一，正在发言。
word_etyma: com 共同 + mission使命 + er 表示人,行为的主动者，做某事的人 → n. 理事；委员；行政长官；总裁
